item.description: AKS Automatic Deployments setup #Azure #AKS #Kubernetes For Creating a AKS cluster with Automatic deployments: Requirements: A valid Azure subscription kubectl installed azure-cli installed Steps: Create a resource group, acr and aks: 1 2 3 4 5 az group create --name test-nginx --location uksouth az acr create --resource-group test-nginx --name shrestharajat --sku Basic az aks create --resource-group test-nginx --name nginx-cluster --node-count 1 --enable-addons monitoring Link the ACR to AKS 1 az aks update -n nginx-cluster -g test-nginx --attach-acr shrestharajat Push an initial image to ACR 1 az acr build --image nginx/testnginx:latest --registry shrestharajat --file Dockerfile .
